entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 22 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 22 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 38 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
